notifications.get_notifications.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while retrieving notifications
Error 503: Service unavailable - The notification service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The notification retrieval request timed out. Please try again.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - Too many requests to the notification service. Please try again in a few seconds.
Error 403: Permission denied - Notification access permission is required. Please grant notification access permissions.

notifications.reply_notification.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while sending reply
Error 503: Service unavailable - The notification service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The reply sending request timed out. Please try again.
Error 429: Rate limit exceeded - Too many requests to the notification service. Please try again in a few seconds.
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid message body or recipient information provided
Error 404: Not found - The specified notification bundle key was not found
Error 403: Permission denied - Reply action is not supported for this notification bundle

notifications.reply_notification_message.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while processing missing information request
Error 503: Service unavailable - The notification service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
Error 408: Request timeout - The request for missing information timed out. Please try again.
Error 400: Bad request - Unable to process request due to insufficient information

notifications.filter_by_sender.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while filtering by sender
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid sender name provided for filtering
Error 404: Not found - No notifications found from the specified sender

notifications.filter_by_app.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while filtering by app
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid app name provided for filtering
Error 404: Not found - No notifications found from the specified app

notifications.bundle_processing.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while processing notification bundles
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid bundle structure or missing required fields
Error 507: Insufficient storage - Too many notifications to process, please filter or try again later

notifications.message_parsing.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while parsing message content
Error 422: Unprocessable entity - Unable to decode message content due to unsupported character encoding
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid message format or corrupted message content

notifications.sender_lookup.message: Error 500: Internal server error - Notification service encountered an unexpected error while looking up sender information
Error 404: Not found - Sender information not found in the notification data
Error 400: Bad request - Invalid sender ID or name format
